about_the_game:
About This Game

Overview


Dive into the epic battles of Tiny Warlords, a pixel art RTS where strategy and skill reign supreme. As a solo developer, I'm proud to present my first published game, where you command one of six unique factions in a battle for supremacy on the battlefield.

Game Features


Six Distinct Factions: Choose between Humans, Orcs, Dwarfs, Elves, Demons, and Undead. Each faction boasts 10 unique units with distinct stats and abilities, offering a diverse range of strategies and playstyles.

Unique Resource Management: Each faction has a unique method of obtaining resources, which are crucial for deploying abilities and upgrading your units. Mastering resource management is key to gaining the upper hand in battle.

Skirmish Mode: Test your skills against AI opponents in intense skirmishes. Perfect your strategy and adapt to different AI tactics.

Campaign Mode: Embark on a journey across a procedurally generated map. Decide your path, upgrade your army, and conquer territories in a dynamic campaign that offers endless replayability.

Multiplayer Modes: Challenge friends and rivals in local and online player-versus-player modes. Prove your dominance on the global stage or enjoy casual matches with friends.

Rogue-lite Elements: Experience the thrill of rogue-lite gameplay as you make strategic decisions that carry lasting consequences. Adapt to ever-changing scenarios and evolve your strategy to overcome new challenges.

Join the Battle


Prepare for a unique RTS experience where every decision counts. Whether you're commanding the resilient Humans, the fierce Orcs, the stalwart Dwarfs, the graceful Elves, the malevolent Demons, or the relentless Undead, victory awaits those who are bold enough to seize it. Tiny Warlords offers a rich blend of strategic depth and pixel art charm that will captivate both veterans and newcomers to the genre.

Wishlist and Follow


Don't miss out on updates and announcements! Add Tiny Warlords to your wishlist and follow us for the latest news and exclusive content.

name: Tiny Warlords

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2500 (Ivy Bridge), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (Kepler), AMD Radeon HD 7750 (GCN 1.0)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Command six unique factions in Tiny Warlords, a pixel art RTS. Engage in strategic battles, manage resources, and upgrade your army. Play skirmish, campaign, and multiplayer modes with rogue-lite elements. Developed by a solo developer, this game offers deep strategy and endless replayability.
